trips.name: Gale Reef
trips.description: Experience the vibrant marine life at this stunning coral reef. Perfect for snorkeling and diving enthusiasts, with crystal clear waters and a diverse ecosystem.

trips.name: Dawson's Reef
trips.description: A hidden gem known for its tranquil waters and abundant sea turtles. Ideal for underwater photography and peaceful swims in nature's aquarium.

trips.name: Claire's Reef
trips.description: Discover this colorful underwater paradise, home to exotic fish species and intricate coral formations. A must-visit for both beginner and experienced divers.
